channel.title: Xampp SQL
channel.description:
Does any one know how to change the port of the SQL service for Xampp?
Not Apache, I know how to change that port.

item.title: Xampp SQL
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Don’t fucking post then?

I never used XAMPP, so I’m just used to configuring things on *NIX… However, it SHOULD be the same… First of all, shutdown MySQL, in the mysql dir [in xampp folder?] there should me a my.cnf… if there isn’t, is there a conf-type file?
Anyway, if you find it, open it and go to [client] section, which is down a bit, not far… You’ll see port and socket in there hopefully, change the number beside port. Leave the socket line alone. Then start MySQL up again.

Read full topic
